data.text: @termined_d @nsgov So those 10 deaths are your new 10 followers?

@44degreesNSian @nsgov Wake up people, masks don’t work just like the jab doesn’t vax.
Cloth mask = pointless
Med mask blocks 3.0 micron
Covid is aerosol and 0.12 micron, the minuscule droplets are up to 0.3, nowhere near being blocked by masks.
Stop being brainwashed.

@termined_d @nsgov Covid related, we’ve already established that gov grabs at anything to say covid related. Like when Tim reported the kid who died from heart issues and didn’t have c19. 
And FYI, the elderly die from flu and colds regularly, you only care about c19 because they’ve brainwashed you
@44degreesNSian @nsgov Masks don’t actually do anything Karen
@nsgov Pfizer, under the direction of courts, releases their known side effects from the vaccine...just a short list.. these things can be arguably 'Related to covid' 😅 https://t.co/9RgrD6RgZg

@44degreesNSian @nsgov If you want to wear a mask you are still allowed. Your mask and vaccines will protect you. You can also choose to stay at home too if the worry is too high. There is a lot you can do to protect yourself. Many people need to move on though for their mental health. Especially kids

@nsgov Genuine question, for anybody that wants the mandates and masks to continue, where do you see the end?? Covid isn't going anywhere and is here to stay so where do you draw the line for mandates etc?? Again it's a genuine question and not to ruffle feathers
